testsuite.name: hello.HelloControllerTest

testcase.name: getHello

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Response content Expected: "Greetings from the thing Missy has been attempting all freaking day!" but: was "beans from the thing Missy has been attempting all freaking day!"
